name: rcg_gui
summary: A dark background color scheme for GUI
description:
A simple dark background color scheme for GUI

Download at http://rcg-pt.net/programacao/rcg_gui.vim.gz
install_details:
Put this file in your vim color directory (e.g. ~/.vim/colors).

Add lines below to your .vimrc file:
if has("gui_running")
  colorscheme rcg_gui
endif
